About

Hey there! I’m Lachlan Campbell, or @lachlanjc. Though I’m still in middle school, I passionately design and build apps for the web. My most recent project is Noodles, a web app help people cook better.

Check out my “Portfolio” as well.

This site was built by @lachlanjc with Jekyll, Typekit, Basscss, and GitHub Pages.

Oh, and there's an RSS feed.
